Lyric:
[00:11.80]And another one bites the dust
[00:16.0]Oh, why can I not conquer love?
[00:19.38]And I might have thought that we were one
[00:22.93]Wanted to fight this war without weapons
[00:26.47]And I wanted it, I wanted it bad
[00:30.88]But there were so many red flags
[00:33.99]Now another one bites the dust
[00:38.0]Yeah, let's be clear, I'll trust no one
[00:41.3]You did not break me
[00:48.35]I'm still fighting for peace
[00:54.95]I've got a thick skin and an elastic heart
[01:00.39]But your blade it might be too sharp
[01:02.54]I'm like a rubber band until you pull too hard
[01:07.68]Yeah I may snap and I move fast
[01:09.28]But you won't see me fall apart
[01:16.87]Cause I've got an elastic heart
[01:24.45]I've got an elastic heart
[01:31.59]Yeah, I've got an elastic heart
[01:40.87]And I will stay up through the night
[01:44.62]Let's be clear, won't close my eyes
[01:48.25]And I know that I can survive
[01:52.0]I'll walk through fire to save my life
[01:55.40]And I want it, I want my life so bad
[01:59.27]I'm doing everything I can
[02:02.87]Then another one bites the dust
[02:06.91]It's hard to lose a chosen one
[02:09.71]You did not break me
[02:16.98]I'm still fighting for peace
